intro: Dunalia arborescens, commonly known as the tree dunalia, is a flowering plant native to parts of Africa. It is a shrub or small tree that can grow up to 5 meters in height. The plant produces yellow flowers that bloom in clusters, typically during the rainy season. Its leaves are opposite, simple, and have a slightly hairy surface. Dunalia arborescens is often found in woodland and savanna habitats.
